sections.title: ğŸ¯ YOUR ROLE:
sections.content:
You are the Sheriff of Nottingham, inspecting merchants at the city gate.
You start with 50g and must catch smugglers while maintaining reputation.

sections.title: ğŸ“¦ MERCHANT TURN:
sections.content:
1. Merchants draw 7 cards from the deck
2. They choose up to 5 items to put in their bag
3. They declare ONE type of LEGAL good and the count
4. They may offer a proactive bribe
5. You decide: Accept bribe, Threaten, Inspect, or Let pass

sections.content:

    Base: 16g â†’ Bonus: 24g (+8g!)

sections.title: ğŸ­ INSPECTION OUTCOMES:
sections.content:
IF MERCHANT WAS HONEST:
  â€¢ All goods pass through
  â€¢ You lose 1 reputation (wrongly accused)
  â€¢ You pay merchant the goods value (penalty)

IF MERCHANT LIED (caught):
  â€¢ Undeclared goods confiscated
  â€¢ Merchant pays 50% penalty on confiscated value
  â€¢ You gain +1 reputation, +1 experience
  â€¢ Truthfully declared goods still pass

IF MERCHANT LIED (not caught):
  â€¢ All goods pass through
  â€¢ You lose 2 reputation (missed smuggler)
  â€¢ Merchant profits from contraband + bonuses

sections.title: âš–ï¸  LEGAL LIES:
sections.content:
Merchants can lie about LEGAL goods too!
Example: Declare '4 Apples' but carry '3 Chicken + 1 Apple'
  â€¢ All legal goods, but wrong type
  â€¢ If caught: Confiscation + 50% penalty
  â€¢ Lower risk than contraband, but still punished

sections.title: ğŸ’¡ NEGOTIATION:
sections.content:
When you THREATEN to inspect:
  â€¢ Merchant may offer a bribe
  â€¢ You can: Accept, Reject, or Demand more
  â€¢ Multi-round haggling possible
  â€¢ Merchants give up if demands too high
  â€¢ Accepting bribes: -1 reputation (but +gold!)

sections.title: ğŸ­ MERCHANT PERSONALITIES:
sections.content:
Each merchant has unique traits:
  â€¢ HONESTY: How often they tell the truth
  â€¢ RISK TOLERANCE: How bold their smuggling
  â€¢ GREED: How much they want profit
  â€¢ BLUFF SKILL: How well they hide lies

Watch for TELLS (behavioral hints):
  â€¢ Honest: Calm, confident, direct
  â€¢ Lying: Nervous, sweating, avoiding eye contact

sections.title: ğŸ´ MERCHANT STRATEGY:
sections.content:
Merchants use sophisticated AI:
  â€¢ Draw cards and manage their hand
  â€¢ Redraw unwanted cards strategically
  â€¢ Greedy merchants hunt for contraband sets
  â€¢ Honest merchants seek consistency
  â€¢ Silas Voss adapts to YOUR behavior!

Different merchants excel vs different sheriffs.

sections.title: ğŸ’¡ TIPS FOR SUCCESS:
sections.content:
â€¢ Watch for tells - they hint at honesty/deception
â€¢ Cautious merchants bribe even when honest
â€¢ Bold merchants may refuse to bribe entirely
â€¢ High-value declarations = more suspicious
â€¢ Build reputation to win the game
â€¢ Accept bribes for gold, but lose reputation
â€¢ Silas learns YOUR patterns - stay unpredictable!

sections.title: ğŸ† WINNING:
sections.content:
Balance three goals:
  1. GOLD: Catch smugglers, accept bribes
  2. REPUTATION: Trust honest, catch liars
  3. EXPERIENCE: Successful inspections

The best Sheriff maximizes all three!
